ComicInfo.Summary:
Max Damage: One year ago: When Max Damage tracks down his partner in crime to Madame Mercy's Super-Brothel, he winds up bringing home Jailbait.
Kaidan: Five years ago: A young woman undergoes the ceremony that will imbue her with the powers of Kaidan.
Hornet: Five years ago: While The Hornet suits up for his debut as the world's first superhero, his wife turns on the television to discover "reports of a flying man ... stopping tsunamis, averting rail disasters, and more" — The Plutonian. Four years ago: After the pair rescues a kidnapped boy, The Hornet reluctantly accepts Plutonian's hand in camaraderie. Four weeks ago: The Hornet, pursued by The Plutonian, launches Vesper One.
ComicInfo.Title: Max Damage; Kaidan; Hornet
